column1: '''Appendix A''' of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' contains historical background of the events in [[Middle-earth]] prior to the [[War of the Ring]].  Its main focus is on the [[Men|Mannish]] kingdoms of [[Númenor]]
column3: and on the [[Dwarves]] of the line of [[Durin]].  It also contains the story of [[Aragorn]] and [[Arwen]].

column1: **Númenor <small>(A synopsis of the events of ''[[The Silmarillion]]''
**The Realms in Exile <small>(A list of the [[kings of Arnor]] and [[Kings of Gondor|Gondor]]
column2: including the [[Chieftains of the Dúnedain]] and the [[Ruling Steward|Ruling Stewards]] of Gondor.)</small>

column3: and the Heirs of Isildur <small>(The history of the Northern Kingdom

column1: **Gondor and the Heirs of Anarion <small>(The history of Gondor
column2: including a few details of the lives of [[Denethor|Denethor II]]

column1: **The Tale of Aragorn and Arwen <small>(Traces the love story of that couple
*Durin's Folk <small>(Focuses on the Dwarves of that line.  Some of the events leading up to the [[Quest of Erebor]] are given.  This section contains a family tree of Durin
